about_the_game:
※ Wishlist, Please!

Hello, I’m Happyone, the developer of Kkokko Industry.

If Kkokko Industry has captured your heart, please add it to your wishlist. It’s the best way to support us. Let’s create this adorable game together!

1. Welcome to Kkokko Industry

Have you ever raised an adorable chick?

Kkokko Industry is a relaxing idle game where you raise chickens on a small farm to produce eggs, sell them, and gradually expand your chicken farm.

2. Cozy Idle Game

This game runs on one side of your monitor, allowing you to enjoy it comfortably while working on other tasks.

When you suddenly feel curious about the cute chicks, take a glance at the game screen.

3. Game Features

a. Build your own chicken farm

- Raise chickens to produce fresh eggs. Sell the eggs you produce and upgrade your chicken farm to make it even better.

b. Research new breeds and technologies

- Discover new breeds of chickens and develop new technologies through research to maximize productivity.

c. Explore various areas

- Pioneer diverse regions such as laboratories, ruins, wastelands, and harbors.

- Build chicken farms with themes tailored to each area.

Start your relaxing yet rewarding chicken farm management today!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
